sqlMap.select: select t.* from (select cg.guess_id, cg.guess_topic, cg.guess_type, cg.guess_content, date_to_unixtime(cg.end_time) * 1000 as end_time, (cg.end_time - sysdate) * 24 * 3600 * 1000 as left_time from CONF_GUESS cg where cg.end_time > sysdate and cg.guess_type = #type# and cg.guess_topic = #topic# order by cg.end_time) t where rownum <= #count#
select t.option_id, t.option_content from conf_guess_option t where t.guess_id = #guessId#

select t1.guess_id, t2.guess_content, t1.user_option, t3.option_content as uOpt_Content, t2.guess_result as correct_option, t2.option_content as cOpt_Content, decode(t2.guess_result, null, 2, t1.guess_resault) as guess_state, t1.amount as cost_amount, t1.win_amount, date_to_unixtime(t2.end_time) * 1000 as end_time from hist_guess t1 join ( select a.guess_content, a.guess_id, a.guess_result, a.end_time, b.option_content from conf_guess a left join conf_guess_option b on a.guess_result = b.option_id ) t2 on t1.guess_id = t2.guess_id join conf_guess_option t3 on t1.user_option = t3.option_id where t1.userid = #userId# order by t2.end_time desc
sqlMap.insert: insert into consume_history(histid, ntype, userid, amount, dtime, typedesc, product, count) values(#histId#, #ntype#, #userId#, #showMoney#, sysdate, #typeDesc#, #product#, #count#)
